duties_responsibilities.duty: Direct supervision of field crews, with 80% field and 20% office responsibilities.
Maintain focus on safety, quality, training, and employee engagement.
Develop relationships with internal and external customers for achieving business goals.
Manage daily employee issues, payroll, timekeeping, benefits, and training requirements.
Support the training of new and current employees to reduce turnover and promote efficiency.
Obtain ATSSA and state-specific certifications, become a subject matter expert in work zone setup/design and professional flagging.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED completion, 4-year degree in a business-related field is a plus
